### Sahuagin

_Humanoids with sea-green skin, webbed limbs, and shark teeth. Vicious hunters._

**LV** 2, **AL** C
**AC** 14, **HP** 9, **MV** near (swim)
**ATK** 2 trident (near) +1 (1d6)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 1 | 1 | 0 | -1 | 0 | -1 |

**Half-Amphibious:** Must be submerged in water every 4 hours or suffocates.
